segments.text: Hey , That's a really nice outfit you have on .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Why , thank you . I wasn't sure if it looked okay or not . I can't believe all the words the salesgirl said .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , you look stunning . Your dress really goes well with your shoes .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm glad that you think so . I thought it might be a bit too revealing .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , not at all . It looks really classy on you . Where did you pick that up ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I got it on sale down at the department store .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: When did you go there ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I was just there a couple of days ago . You know , you should go down there too . They have a lot of stylish clothes on sale .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I might just do that . What style of clothes do they have ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Anything you want . They have both casual and formal styles .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I was hoping to get a few new ties for my collection .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's a good idea . Some of your ties are pretty outdated .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I spent a lot of money on getting my shirts tailor-made , so I couldn't afford to buy any new ties .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Anyways , are you going to the party tonight ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I am . Say , are you going to wear that outfit to the party ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't think so . It is a little too formal . I'm probably going to wear something more laid back .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Me too . I will probably go dressed in a T-shirt and jeans .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I guess that you will really be dressing down .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's my style when I'm not in the office .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good point . I suppose that we all have our own individual styles .
segments.speaker: S2
